author: Reuters Editorial
title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St slides as tech stumbles, Treasury yields climb
text:
NEW YORK, April 20 (Reuters) - Wall Street’s three major indexes declined on Friday, as investors worried about a jump in U.S. bond yields and technology stocks led the decline on nerves about upcoming earnings reports and iPhone demand.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 202.09 points, or 0.82 percent, to 24,462.8, the S&P 500 lost 22.98 points, or 0.85 percent, to 2,670.15 and the Nasdaq Composite dropped 91.93 points, or 1.27 percent, to 7,146.13. (Reporting by Sinéad Carew Editing by Chizu Nomiyama)
